languages.text: "Первым Путем, что я прошла, был Путь пробуждения. С ним я обрела способность не только смотреть, но и видеть, а видя — замечать". {n}Эльдарка делает паузу.{/n} "Моим вторым путем мог стать Путь воина, но я выбрала иначе. Ибо умение видеть манило меня за пределы родного мира. И пусть не все были довольны этим решением, но я встала на Путь изгоя. Обрела свободу выбирать, осмыслять, задавать вопросы там, где другие лишь склоняют головы перед словами провидца, диктующего волю судьбы. И я буду следовать своему Пути, пока не достигну вершин".

traits.locale_text: "Первым Путем, что я прошла, был Путь пробуждения. С ним я обрела способность не только смотреть, но и видеть, а видя — замечать". {n}Эльдарка делает паузу.{/n} "Моим вторым путем мог стать Путь воина, но я выбрала иначе. Ибо умение видеть манило меня за пределы родного мира. И пусть не все были довольны этим решением, но я встала на Путь изгоя. Обрела свободу выбирать, осмыслять, задавать вопросы там, где другие лишь склоняют головы перед словами провидца, диктующего волю судьбы. И я буду следовать своему Пути, пока не достигну вершин".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."
languages.original_text: "Первым Путем, что я прошла, был Путь пробуждения. С ним я обрела способность не только смотреть, но и видеть, а видя — замечать". {n}Эльдарка делает паузу.{/n} "Моим вторым путем мог стать Путь воина, но я выбрала иначе. Ибо умение видеть манило меня за пределы родного мира. И пусть не все были довольны этим решением, но я встала на Путь изгоя. Обрела свободу выбирать, осмыслять, задавать вопросы там, где другие лишь склоняют головы перед словами провидца, диктующего волю судьбы. И я буду следовать своему Пути, пока не достигну вершин".

traits.locale_text: "The first Path that I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not to merely look but to see, and take notice of what I saw." {n}The Aeldari woman makes a brief pause.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everybody was pleased with this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Seer who is dictating the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first Path that I walked was the Path of Awakening. languages.text: “我最初选择的道途是觉醒者道途，它赋予了我与众不同的洞察力。我并不仅仅单纯地用眼睛看，而是会留意到我看到的一切。”{n}她顿了顿。{/n}“我本可以选择战士道途作为我的第二条道途，但我的观察力催促我迈出家园的边界，于是我做出了不同的选择。尽管并不是每个人都喜欢我这个决定，但我还是踏上了流浪者道途。其他人都在主宰命运意志的先知面前俯首称臣，而我却得到了选择、质疑与怀疑的自由。我会沿着我的道途前进，直到抵达旅途中终点为止。”
languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

languages.text: «La primera Senda que recorrí fue la del Despertar. Me otorgó la habilidad de no solo mirar, sino de ver y fijarme en lo que hay frente a mí». {n}Hace una pausa.{/n} «Mi segunda Senda podría haber sido la del Guerrero, pero tomé otra decisión, pues la capacidad de ver me impulsaba más allá de los confines de mi mundo. Aunque no todos estaban de acuerdo, me embarqué en la Senda del Proscrito. Obtuve la libertad de decidir, cuestionar y meditar cuando otros se limitan a aceptar la sabiduría de un vidente que dicta su destino. Y seguiré esta Senda hasta alcanzar su cúspide».
languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

traits.locale_text: «La primera Senda que recorrí fue la del Despertar. Me otorgó la habilidad de no solo mirar, sino de ver y fijarme en lo que hay frente a mí». {n}Hace una pausa.{/n} «Mi segunda Senda podría haber sido la del Guerrero, pero tomé otra decisión, pues la capacidad de ver me impulsaba más allá de los confines de mi mundo. Aunque no todos estaban de acuerdo, me embarqué en la Senda del Proscrito. Obtuve la libertad de decidir, cuestionar y meditar cuando otros se limitan a aceptar la sabiduría de un vidente que dicta su destino. Y seguiré esta Senda hasta alcanzar su cúspide».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我が歩んだ最初の道は、覚醒の道だった。単に見るだけでなく、観る力を授けられ、見たものに注意を払うようになった。{n}彼女は言葉を区切る。{/n}「我の第二の道は戦士の道でありえたかもしれない。だが、我は違う道を選んだ。この決断を誰もが喜んでくれたわけではなかったが、我は追放者の道に足を踏み入れた。他の者たちがただ運命の意思を決定する先見司の知恵の前にひれ伏すのに対し、我は選び、問い、疑う自由を得たのだ。そしてその頂点に達するまで、我は自分の道を歩むだろう」
languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

traits.locale_text: 「我が歩んだ最初の道は、覚醒の道だった。単に見るだけでなく、観る力を授けられ、見たものに注意を払うようになった。{n}彼女は言葉を区切る。{/n}「我の第二の道は戦士の道でありえたかもしれない。だが、我は違う道を選んだ。この決断を誰もが喜んでくれたわけではなかったが、我は追放者の道に足を踏み入れた。他の者たちがただ運命の意思を決定する先見司の知恵の前にひれ伏すのに対し、我は選び、問い、疑う自由を得たのだ。そしてその頂点に達するまで、我は自分の道を歩むだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Der erste Pfad, den ich je beschritten habe, war der Pfad der Erweckung. Er hat mir die Fähigkeit verliehen, nicht nur zu schauen, sondern zu sehen, und zu bemerken, was ich sehe." {n}Sie hält kurz inne.{/n} "Mein zweiter Pfad hätte der einer Kriegerin sein können, doch ich habe anders gewählt, denn die Gabe zu sehen hat mich von meiner Heimatwelt fortgerufen. Nicht jeder war erfreut über diese Entscheidung, doch ich habe den Pfad des Ausgestoßenen eingeschlagen. Ich habe die Freiheit erlangt, zu wählen, zu hinterfragen, zu zweifeln, wo die anderen sich lediglich vor der Weisheit eines Runenpropheten verneigen, der den Willen des Schicksals diktiert. Und ich werde meinem Pfad folgen, bis ich seinen Höhepunkt erreiche."
languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

Er hat mir die Fähigkeit verliehen, nicht nur zu schauen, sondern zu sehen, und zu bemerken, was ich sehe." {n}Sie hält kurz inne.{/n} "Mein zweiter Pfad hätte der einer Kriegerin sein können, doch ich habe anders gewählt, denn die Gabe zu sehen hat mich von meiner Heimatwelt fortgerufen. Nicht jeder war erfreut über diese Entscheidung, doch ich habe den Pfad des Ausgestoßenen eingeschlagen. Ich habe die Freiheit erlangt, zu wählen, zu hinterfragen, zu zweifeln, wo die anderen sich lediglich vor der Weisheit eines Runenpropheten verneigen, der den Willen des Schicksals diktiert. Und ich werde meinem Pfad folgen, bis ich seinen Höhepunkt erreiche."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « La première Voie que j'ai suivie était celle de l'Éveil. Elle m'a appris non seulement à regarder, mais aussi à voir et à prêter attention à ce que mes yeux me montraient. » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « Ma deuxième Voie aurait pu être celle du Guerrier, mais j'en ai décidé autrement, car ma vision m'a appelée au-delà des frontières de mon monde. C'est ainsi que je me suis engagée sur la Voie de l'Errance, au grand déplaisir de certains. J'ai gagné la liberté de choisir, de remettre en question et de douter, là où les autres se contentent de s'incliner devant la sagesse d'un grand prophète qui dicte la volonté du destin. Et je suivrai cette Voie jusqu'à son terme. »
languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

Elle m'a appris non seulement à regarder, mais aussi à voir et à prêter attention à ce que mes yeux me montraient. » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « Ma deuxième Voie aurait pu être celle du Guerrier, mais j'en ai décidé autrement, car ma vision m'a appelée au-delà des frontières de mon monde. C'est ainsi que je me suis engagée sur la Voie de l'Errance, au grand déplaisir de certains. Et je suivrai cette Voie jusqu'à son terme. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yürüdüğüm ilk Yol, Uyanışın Yolu idi. Bana yalnızca bakma değil, görme ve gördüklerimin farkına varma kabiliyetini de bahşetmişti." {n}Yrliet duraksıyor.{/n} "İkincim, Savaşçının Yolu olabilirdi. Bense farklı bir seçim yaptım. Çünkü görme kabiliyeti, ana yurdumun hudutlarının da ötesinden beni çağırmıştı. Bu karar herkesi memnun etmemiş olsa da Yurtsuzun Yolu'nda ilk adımımı atmıştım. Yazgının takdirini buyuran Ötesezen'in bilgeliği karşısında diğerlerinin boyun eğmekten başka şansı yoktu. Bense seçme, sorgulama ve şüphelenme özgürlüğü edindim. Bundandır ki zirvesine erişene dek bu Yoldan yürüyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "The first Path I walked was the Path of Awakening. It granted me the ability not merely to look but to see, and to take notice of what I saw." {n}She pauses.{/n} "My second Path could have been that of a Warrior, but I chose differently, for the ability to see called me beyond the boundaries of my homeworld. Though not everyone was pleased by this decision, I stepped onto the Path of the Outcast. I gained the freedom to choose, to question, to doubt where the others merely bow before the wisdom of a Farseer who dictates the will of destiny. And I will follow my Path until I reach its pinnacle."

traits.locale_text: "Yürüdüğüm ilk Yol, Uyanış''n Yolu'ydu. Bana yalnızca bakma değil, görme ve gördüklerimin farkına varma kabiliyetini de bahşetmişti." {n}Duraksıyor.{/n} "İkinci Yolum, Savaşçı'nın Yolu olabilirdi ancak benim seçimim farklıydı. Çünkü görme kabiliyeti, ana yurdumun hudutlarının da ötesinden beni çağırmıştı. Bu karar herkesi memnun etmemiş olsa da Yurtsuz'un Yolunda ilk adımımı atmıştım. Yazgının takdirini buyuran Ötesezen'in bilgeliği karşısında diğerlerinin boyun eğmekten başka şansı yoktu. Bense benzer vaziyetlerde seçme, sorgulama ve şüphelenme özgürlüğü edindim. Bundandır ki zirvesine erişene dek bu Yoldan yürüyeceğim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
